name: Ai & Mako
effect: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3.[Your Turn] When you attack with a Digimon, you may suspend this Tamer to trash the top card of your deck. Then, if the attacking Digimon is [Beelzemon], you may digivolve it into a [Beelzemon Blast Mode] in your trash for a digivolution cost of 3.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
